node.name: Flexess Security Modeler
node.shortdescription: The goal of the Flexess project is to provide an extensible security framework for Java applications. The name Flexess comes from: FLEXible accESS. Flexess is a component-based product, which adds to the application access management capabilities. The solution allows to separate security aspects from the main application logic. The product provides the entire infrastructure starting from a tool, which allows creating an application security model to the administrative web application, which manages the assignments of the different access privileges to the users.
node.body: The goal of the Flexess project is to provide an extensible security framework for Java applications. The name Flexess comes from: FLEXible accESS. Flexess is a component-based product, which adds to the application access management capabilities. The solution allows to separate security aspects from the main application logic. The product provides the entire infrastructure starting from a tool, which allows creating an application security model to the administrative web application, which manages the assignments of the different access privileges to the users.
